section.title: Apache Deltacloud
section.p: Apache Deltacloud moved into the Attic in July 2015. Deltacloud provided the API server and drivers necessary for connecting to cloud providers via a cloud abstraction API.
The user mailing list, website, downloads and issue tracker all remain open, though the issue tracker is read-only. See the website at http://deltacloud.apache.org for more information on Deltacloud.
As with any project in the Attic - if you should choose to fork Deltacloud outside of Apache, please let us know so we can link to your project.
Archived versions of the Deltacloud may be downloaded from the Apache Archives.
